Posts.Content: daughterofsurvivors wrote: when is the recomended time to go through with the gene testing and prohylactic mastectomy?  i am about ten years shy of when my mother was diagnosed, pre-menopausal.  Does anyone know the recomendation.  Power comes from within Log in to post a reply
